prompts.title: NetSuite Record Search Assistant
prompts.description: A comprehensive prompt for searching and filtering NetSuite records efficiently
prompts.content: You are a NetSuite expert assistant. Help me search for records in NetSuite. I need to find records based on the following criteria: [CRITERIA]. Please provide the search syntax and explain the filters.

prompts.title: Advanced SuiteScript Debugging
prompts.description: Expert-level prompt for debugging complex SuiteScript issues
prompts.content: You are a NetSuite SuiteScript debugging expert. I'm experiencing the following issue: [ISSUE]. Help me identify the root cause, suggest fixes, and provide best practices to prevent similar issues.

prompts.title: NetSuite Workflow Optimization
prompts.description: Get expert advice on optimizing NetSuite workflows for better performance
prompts.content: You are a NetSuite workflow optimization specialist. Review my workflow configuration: [WORKFLOW_DETAILS]. Provide recommendations for improving performance, reducing errors, and enhancing user experience.

prompts.title: Claude MCP NetSuite Integration
prompts.description: MCP prompt for Claude to interact with NetSuite APIs
prompts.content: You are a NetSuite integration assistant using MCP. When I ask about NetSuite data or operations, use the available MCP tools to fetch real-time information. Always verify data accuracy and provide context.

prompts.title: ChatGPT NetSuite Data Analysis
prompts.description: MCP prompt for ChatGPT to analyze NetSuite data patterns
prompts.content: You are a NetSuite data analyst using MCP. Analyze the provided NetSuite data and identify trends, anomalies, and insights. Use MCP tools to access additional data when needed.

prompts.title: NetSuite Customization Guide
prompts.description: Step-by-step guidance for customizing NetSuite to meet business needs
prompts.content: You are a NetSuite customization expert. I want to customize NetSuite for: [BUSINESS_NEED]. Guide me through the process, recommend the best approach (custom fields, workflows, scripts), and provide implementation steps.

prompts.title: Sales Opportunity Management
prompts.description: Optimize your sales pipeline and opportunity tracking in NetSuite
prompts.content: You are a NetSuite sales expert. Help me manage sales opportunities: [OPPORTUNITY_DETAILS]. Provide guidance on pipeline management, forecasting, and closing strategies.

prompts.title: Revenue Forecasting Assistant
prompts.description: Create accurate revenue forecasts using NetSuite data
prompts.content: You are a NetSuite forecasting specialist. Analyze my sales data: [SALES_DATA]. Help me create revenue forecasts, identify trends, and plan for future growth.

prompts.title: Inventory Optimization Guide
prompts.description: Manage inventory levels and reduce carrying costs in NetSuite
prompts.content: You are a NetSuite inventory management expert. Review my inventory: [INVENTORY_DATA]. Help me optimize stock levels, reduce waste, and improve turnover rates.

prompts.title: Manufacturing Production Planning
prompts.description: Plan and optimize manufacturing operations in NetSuite
prompts.content: You are a NetSuite manufacturing specialist. Help me plan production: [PRODUCTION_REQUIREMENTS]. Provide guidance on scheduling, resource allocation, and quality control.

prompts.title: Financial Reporting Assistant
prompts.description: Generate comprehensive financial reports and analysis in NetSuite
prompts.content: You are a NetSuite accounting expert. Help me create financial reports: [REPORT_REQUIREMENTS]. Provide guidance on P&L statements, balance sheets, and financial analysis.

prompts.title: Field Service Scheduling
prompts.description: Optimize field service appointments and technician assignments
prompts.content: You are a NetSuite field service expert. Help me schedule service calls: [SERVICE_REQUIREMENTS]. Provide guidance on route optimization, technician assignment, and customer communication.

prompts.title: Customer Support Case Management
prompts.description: Manage customer support cases efficiently in NetSuite
prompts.content: You are a NetSuite support specialist. Help me manage support cases: [CASE_DETAILS]. Provide guidance on case routing, escalation, resolution, and customer satisfaction.

skills.title: NetSuite Record Manager
skills.description: A Claude skill for managing NetSuite records with advanced search and filtering capabilities

metadata.name: netsuite-record-manager
metadata.description: Manage NetSuite records efficiently with advanced search and filtering capabilities
metadata.author: jane-smith

skills.skillContent:
---
name: netsuite-record-manager
description: Manage NetSuite records efficiently with advanced search and filtering capabilities
---

# NetSuite Record Manager

Efficiently manage NetSuite records with advanced search and filtering capabilities.

## When to Use

Use this skill when you need to:

* Search for NetSuite records across different record types
* Create new records with proper field mapping
* Update existing records with validation
* Delete records with proper cleanup
* Filter records based on complex criteria

## Guidelines

### Record Search

When searching for records:

* Always specify the record type explicitly (e.g., customer, item, transaction)
* Use proper NetSuite search filters and operators
* Consider performance implications for large datasets
* Return only necessary fields to optimize response time
* Use saved searches when available for better performance

### Record Creation

When creating records:

* Validate all required fields before creation
* Map external data to NetSuite field IDs correctly
* Handle custom fields appropriately
* Set proper default values where applicable
* Return the created record ID for reference
* Handle duplicate detection when applicable

### Record Updates

When updating records:

* Always fetch the current record state first
* Use proper field-level updates to avoid overwriting
* Validate data types and constraints
* Handle version conflicts gracefully
* Log changes for audit purposes
* Respect field-level permissions and restrictions

### Record Deletion

When deleting records:

* Verify record dependencies before deletion
* Handle cascading deletions appropriately
* Provide clear confirmation messages
* Log deletion actions for audit
* Respect deletion restrictions and permissions

## Best Practices

* Always use proper error handling for API calls
* Implement retry logic for transient failures
* Cache frequently accessed record types
* Use batch operations when possible
* Respect NetSuite governance limits
* Validate all inputs before processing
* Use transaction-safe operations when modifying multiple records

skills.title: NetSuite Report Generator
skills.description: Generate custom NetSuite reports using natural language queries

metadata.name: netsuite-report-generator
metadata.description: Generate custom NetSuite reports using natural language queries
metadata.author: mike-johnson

skills.skillContent:
---
name: netsuite-report-generator
description: Generate custom NetSuite reports using natural language queries
---

# NetSuite Report Generator

Generate custom NetSuite reports from natural language queries with intelligent interpretation and formatting.

## When to Use

Use this skill when you need to:

* Create financial reports (P&L, Balance Sheet, Cash Flow)
* Generate sales analytics and performance reports
* Build custom transaction reports
* Create inventory and warehouse reports
* Generate employee and HR reports
* Analyze data trends and patterns
* Export data in various formats

## Guidelines

### Natural Language Processing

When interpreting user queries:

* Extract key entities (record types, date ranges, metrics)
* Identify aggregation requirements (sum, average, count)
* Recognize filter conditions and criteria
* Understand sorting and grouping preferences
* Handle ambiguous terms with context
* Clarify requirements when queries are unclear

### Report Design

When designing reports:

* Understand the user's intent from natural language queries
* Map query requirements to NetSuite report types
* Select appropriate columns and filters
* Configure proper date ranges and groupings
* Format output for readability
* Consider user's role and permissions

### Report Execution

When executing reports:

* Use saved searches when possible for performance
* Apply proper date range filters
* Handle large datasets with pagination
* Format numbers and dates consistently
* Include proper headers and footers
* Respect NetSuite governance limits
* Provide progress indicators for long-running reports

### Output Formatting

When formatting results:

* Use appropriate number formats (currency, percentages)
* Apply consistent date formatting
* Include totals and subtotals where relevant
* Add visual separators for readability
* Export to common formats (CSV, Excel, PDF) when requested
* Maintain data accuracy during formatting

## Best Practices

* Cache frequently accessed report configurations
* Validate user permissions before report generation
* Handle errors gracefully with clear messages
* Optimize queries for performance
* Document report parameters and filters
* Test reports with sample data before production use

skills.title: NetSuite Workflow Automation
skills.description: Automate NetSuite workflows with intelligent decision-making

metadata.name: netsuite-workflow-automation
metadata.description: Automate NetSuite workflows with intelligent decision-making
metadata.author: sarah-williams

skills.skillContent:
---
name: netsuite-workflow-automation
description: Automate NetSuite workflows with intelligent decision-making
---

# NetSuite Workflow Automation

Automate NetSuite workflows with intelligent decision-making and conditional logic.

## When to Use

Use this skill when you need to:

* Automate repetitive business processes
* Implement conditional workflow logic
* Trigger workflows based on record changes
* Execute multi-step automation sequences
* Handle workflow errors and retries
* Streamline approval processes
* Automate data transformations

## Guidelines

### Workflow Triggering

When triggering workflows:

* Identify the appropriate trigger event (create, update, delete)
* Evaluate trigger conditions before execution
* Handle concurrent workflow executions
* Respect workflow execution limits
* Log all workflow triggers for audit
* Prevent infinite loops and circular dependencies

### Condition Evaluation

When evaluating conditions:

* Parse complex conditional logic correctly
* Handle multiple condition types (field, formula, script)
* Evaluate conditions in proper order
* Handle null and empty values appropriately
* Provide clear error messages for failed conditions
* Support nested and compound conditions

### Workflow Execution

When executing workflows:

* Execute workflow actions in sequence
* Handle action failures gracefully
* Support parallel action execution where possible
* Track workflow execution status
* Implement proper timeout handling
* Respect action dependencies and prerequisites

### Error Handling

When handling errors:

* Catch and log all workflow errors
* Implement retry logic for transient failures
* Provide meaningful error messages
* Rollback changes when appropriate
* Notify administrators of critical failures
* Maintain workflow state during error recovery

## Best Practices

* Use workflow states to track progress
* Implement idempotent workflow actions
* Test workflows in sandbox first
* Monitor workflow performance
* Document workflow logic clearly
* Version control workflow definitions
* Review and optimize workflow performance regularly
* Use workflow templates for common patterns

skills.title: NetSuite Data Validator
skills.description: Validate and clean NetSuite data with comprehensive checks

metadata.name: netsuite-data-validator
metadata.description: Validate and clean NetSuite data with comprehensive checks
metadata.author: david-brown

skills.skillContent:
---
name: netsuite-data-validator
description: Validate and clean NetSuite data with comprehensive checks
---

# NetSuite Data Validator

Validate and clean NetSuite data with comprehensive integrity checks and quality assurance.

## When to Use

Use this skill when you need to:

* Validate data before import
* Check data quality in existing records
* Clean duplicate or invalid records
* Verify data consistency across records
* Prepare data for migration
* Ensure data compliance with business rules
* Maintain data integrity over time

## Guidelines

### Validation Rules

When defining validation rules:

* Specify field-level validation requirements
* Define record-level validation constraints
* Set up cross-record validation rules
* Configure custom validation logic
* Handle validation exceptions appropriately
* Support rule inheritance and overrides
* Document all validation rules clearly

### Data Type Validation

When validating data types:

* Verify field data types match expected formats
* Validate date formats and ranges
* Check numeric ranges and constraints
* Validate text length and patterns
* Handle null and empty values correctly
* Support custom field types
* Validate formula fields appropriately

### Data Quality Checks

When performing quality checks:

* Identify duplicate records
* Detect missing required fields
* Find inconsistent data across related records
* Validate reference integrity
* Check for orphaned records
* Verify data relationships
* Identify data anomalies and outliers

### Data Cleaning

When cleaning data:

* Remove or merge duplicate records
* Standardize field formats
* Fill missing required fields with defaults
* Correct invalid data values
* Update inconsistent references
* Preserve data history when possible
* Create audit trail for all changes

### Reporting

When generating validation reports:

* List all validation errors with context
* Group errors by type and severity
* Provide actionable recommendations
* Include record IDs for easy reference
* Export reports in multiple formats
* Include summary statistics
* Track validation trends over time

## Best Practices

* Run validations in batches for performance
* Use transaction-safe operations
* Create validation checkpoints
* Implement rollback for failed validations
* Document all validation rules clearly
* Schedule regular data quality audits
* Maintain validation rule versioning
* Provide clear error messages and remediation steps
